data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Lotfollahi, Parisa, Irani-Nejad, Karim Haddad, Lillo, Enrico De (2014): Eriophyoid mites (Acari: Trombidiformes: Eriophyoidea) of Rosales trees in Iran: two new species and three new records. Zootaxa 3861 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3861.1.4
